events.message: The claimant reported a rear-end car collision that caused moderate damage to the vehicle on February 28th.
Claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on keywords related to vehicle damage and collision reported.
An agent was assigned promptly to assist the claimant with the car accident insurance claim process.
The insurance company acknowledged the receipt of claim and assured timely support for the auto accident case.
The claimant was asked to submit photographs of the damaged vehicle along with the police accident report for review.
The claimant provided all requested documents including repair estimates and accident report within the deadline.
The investigation team began reviewing the claim details and submitted documents related to the auto accident.
Investigation confirmed liability and validated damage costs, supporting the claimant’s request for vehicle repairs.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the estimated repair costs and associated expenses from the accident.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the timely communication and clarity of the proposed settlement offer.
The claim was formally approved following acceptance of terms and verification of all submitted documentation.
The settlement payment was processed and issued to the claimant’s bank account without delay.
The claim was officially closed after payment, with all records updated to reflect resolution of the auto accident case.
